title.rendered: Chick-fil-A at Kid’s Corner + Homeschool Room

content.rendered:
Chick-fil-A to Read at Kid’s Corner

Our friends at Chick-fil-A are visiting us next week for Kid’s Corner. Owner/Operator Pat Braski will read at the Warner Robins location, and Tricia Barrett will be in Macon.

See you there!

Homeschool Room

Check out our homeschool room at our Byron store! We now send all of our homeschool materials to this location. More titles are arriving every week, so we should have plenty of books to supply your kids’ education. There are books from every subject, and remember our special pricing for that room. Prices range from $.97 to $7.97.

School Summer Reading

We have your school’s summer reading books in stock! If you don’t see what you need, please let us know. We are continually maintaining a full inventory of the titles your schools require.
